abstract: Op-Ed article by media columnist Michael Wolff documents surprising success of television industry despite disruptions from digital competitors; observes key factor is television's turn away from advertising revenue and toward fee- and subscription-based services; notes change has lessened power of ratings and led to era of high quality content; contends fee model is model of future, and digital world should pay attention.
lead_paragraph: Digital media has rediscovered a very old business model. Make your customers pay.
snippet: Digital media has rediscovered a very old business model. Make your customers pay.
